channel.title: W9 form mistake
channel.description:
Not a law forum but...
I filled a w9 form with apple dev about six months ago and put all the right info excluding legal name. Even the signature was right.
So now I have to pay taxes, but the information is incorrect. I sent them a new form through the mail.
Now im shitting brix that I might go to jail for perjury since I put a completely fucked up name.
Anyone have any sort of experience with this kind of stuff? Not the right place to ask, I know.

item.title: W9 form mistake
item.dc:creator: @abraham2119 abraham2119
item.description:
@abraham2119 wrote:

[quote=“la­wl, post:6, topic:382577”][quote author=abraham2119 link=topic=478371.msg3501860#msg3501860 date=1297806241]

When you go to jail, don’t drop the soap. In the case that you do, don’t pick it up just leave it there.
[/quote]/reddit

what…[/quote]there was an entire thread on reddit regarding this…

Read full topic
